page.title: 03NEAR THE CATHEDRAL
page.content: SLIGHTLY TO THE NORTH, AROUND THE ROMAN CATHOLIC CATHEDRAL,IS MUCH MORE RESIDENTIAL AND THE HOUSES HERE ARE MUCH BETTER DECORATED AND CARED FOR THAN THOSE TO THE SOUTH. ALTHOUGH THE ROADS ARE IN A GOOD STATE OF REPAIR THE PAVEMENTS ARE OFTEN BADLY CRACKED. MOST RESIDENTS WE SPOKE TO LIKED THE AREA. MANY ELDERLY PEOPLE TOLD US IT IS A VERY FRIENDLY PLACE TO LIVE IN BUT THEY WOULD BE HAPPIER IF A CHEMIST AND A SUPERMARKET WERE CLOSER AT HAND. A GOOD PART OF THE AREA IS TAKEN UP BY A TREE- LINED PARK- WHICH WAS AT ONE TIME THE NORTHAMPTON RACECOURSE. THE HOUSES ALONG ST. GEORGES AVENUE ARE VERY MUCH BIGGER, QUITE OFTEN DETATCHED, AND IN A DESIRABLE POSITION OVERLOOKING THE PARK.
